channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump found guilty of all 34 charges in hush money trial
item.description: A Manhattan jury found Donald Trump guilty on all 34 counts of falsifying business records he faced in his New York hush money criminal trial.

item.title: Trump's conviction likely won't change his GOP support: Analysis
item.description: The party of "law and order" is undoubtedly moving toward nominating a convicted felon to be atop its presidential ticket.

item.title: Roaches and improperly handling raw meat at Myrtle Beachâ€™s worst restaurant inspections
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: 40 years after dead baby found, Vermont police find the parents
item.description: The dead baby was found in on April 1, 1982 by Vermont children waiting for a school bus.

item.title: May 30, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The war in Gaza will likely continue until at least the end of the year, an Israeli official warned.

item.title: Slovak PM has been released from hospital after he was shot in assassination attempt
item.description: Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico has been released from the hospital after he was shot in an assassination attempt

item.title: Ivanka Trump Breaks Silence With 4-Word Message For Dad After Guilty Verdict
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Trump, Biden debate will face obstacles in bypassing commission, co-chair predicts
item.description: "There's a lot of questions" about the debates that haven't been resolved, co-chair Frank Fahrenkopf said, adding, "That could prevent it from happening."

item.title: May 29, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Israeli military says it established "operational control" over the Philadelphi Corridor, a 14-kilometer (8.7 miles) strip of land along the border between Gaza and Egypt.

item.title: Texas town deploys snow plows after 50-degree temperature swing and 2 feet of hail
item.description: As severe weather continued Thursday across Texas, residents of a southwest Texas town reported a dramatic temperature drop on Wednesday.

item.title: The Social Security COLA Forecast for 2025 Was Just Updated. Here's the Good News and Bad News for Retirees
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Michelle Troconis set for sentencing in death of Jennifer Dulos
item.description: Family and friends of Jennifer Dulos are expected to offer emotional testimony as her late estranged husband's former girlfriend, Michelle Troconis, is sentenced after being convicted of helping to plan and cover up her killing.

item.title: First day of jury deliberations in Trump New York hush money trial
item.description: The jury in Donald Trump's criminal hush money trial has been dismissed for the day after deliberating for more than four hours on Wednesday.

item.title: Manhattan DA Bragg reacts to Trump verdict following historic trial
item.description: A jury found former President Donald Trump guilty on all 34 felony counts related to a 2016 hush money payment to adult film actress Stormy Daniels.

item.title: Judge to consider recalling death sentence of man who killed 12-year-old Polly Klaas
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Judge to mull overturning Polly Klaas killer's death sentence
item.description: A California judge will consider whether to overturn the death sentence against Richard Allen Davis, who in 1993 killed 12-year-old Polly Klaas after kidnapping her from her bedroom in a crime that shocked the nation.

item.title: How to survive a bear attack -- or better yet, avoid one altogether
item.description: Encounters with bears do happen. Experts share how to avoid a bear attack -- and how to survive one if you find yourself in the fight of your life.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Trump supporters call for riots and violent retribution after verdict
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: 5/30: The Daily Report with John Dickerson
item.description: John Dickerson reports on the historic guilty verdict of former President Trump and what it means for his political future.
